info.title: Events - stack-mgr-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for stack manager operations events generated from the Cisco Devices.
     These models may produce high volume of data.

**Event Notifications Module** - Used for model-driven telemetry and streaming subscriptions.

**Usage**: Subscribe to events via NETCONF/RESTCONF subscriptions

**Protocol**: RFC 8639 (Subscription to YANG Notifications)

**Authentication**: HTTP Basic Authentication

**YANG Model:** [Events - stack-mgr-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Events - stack-mgr-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-mgr-events-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-mgr-events-oper.html)

get.description: Retrieve active event subscriptions for Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-mgr-events-oper

post.description: Establish a subscription to Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-mgr-events-oper events
